short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and manage your time efficiently on Manuscript Central.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Amnet Time Tracking Extension allows you to easily track and manage your time spent on tasks within Manuscript Central. With features like identity management, data storage, and active tab tracking, this extension is designed to help you stay organized and productive.
